db:section.db:title: Is there a difference?
db:section.db:para: Yes there is! XSLT is a pure XML technology that traces its roots to tree manipulation algorithms. JSP and PHP offer an ingenious solution to combine scripting languages with HTML/XML tagging.
The difference may not be obvious when you're first learning XSLT (after all, it offers tags and instructions), but understanding the difference will make you a stronger and better developer.

db:section.db:title: How do I learn the difference?
db:section.db:para: Interestingly enough, you can code the XSLT algorithm in XSLT... one cool way to experiment with the difference.
